discord.title: Join our Discord
discord.description: Connect with the community, share what you're building, and stay up to date.

footer.madeWith: Made with Cursor by ambassadors worldwide

featured.defaultDescription: A practical, hands-on workshop series for builders who want to learn Cursor with real workflows.

photos.title: A note on photos
photos.description: We'll be taking photos and videos during the event for social media and future Cursor Community content.
photos.preference: If you'd prefer not to be photographed:
photos.option1: Let the host know when you arrive
photos.option2: We'll make sure to respect your preference

matchmaking.title: Want to meet new people?
matchmaking.step1: Come to the host table and grab a {numberCard} (1-10)
matchmaking.question2: "Are you building something cool with Cursor?"

worldEvents.title: Cafe Cursor around the world
worldEvents.subtitle: Same day, different timezones
worldEvents.description: Cursor users are building together worldwide. Even with timezone differences, we are one community.
